meanings.definition: A young nobleman attendant upon a knight
meanings.sent1: The squier assisted the knight during his training sessions.
meanings.sent2: The squier carried the knight's armor into battle.
meanings.sent3: The squier tried to juggle the knight's swords but ended up dropping them all.
meanings.sent4: The squier's loyalty to the knight was as strong as steel.
meanings.sent5: The squier's dedication to his duties was unwavering.

meanings.definition: A young man of fashion or gallantry
meanings.sent1: The squier wore a stylish doublet to the royal ball.
meanings.sent2: The squier's elegant attire caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The squier's fashion sense was so sharp, he could cut through the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The squier's gallant demeanor charmed all the ladies at the event.
meanings.sent5: The squier's fashion choices were the talk of the town.

meanings.definition: A young man of a certain rank or position
meanings.sent1: The squier held an important position at the royal court.
meanings.sent2: The squier's rank granted him access to exclusive events.
meanings.sent3: The squier's position allowed him to taste all the royal desserts first.
meanings.sent4: The squier's rank was like a key that opened many doors for him.
meanings.sent5: The squier's status in society was well-respected by all.
